basic_info.description: My name is Dennis DeVries. I am a software engineer dedicated to solving problems in order to simplify and enhance the lives of others. I do this by creating elegant products that provide a solution and are simple to use. This results in pleasing and useful applications and websites. I was most recently a military leader and a Mechanical Engineer. I enjoy combining all of my experience and knowledge in order to lead with empathy, learn, and create. I have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python. I believe that with my leadership experience combined with my desire to create helpful projects, we can transform our society.

projects.title: Project Steel
projects.description: Project Steel is an exercise calorie tracker. The main landing page will have an area to input basic information about the user. This will be items like name, weight, time, and exercise. There will be an area for the user to input their workouts which will calculate the calories burned. On a different page of the website will be a graph which displays the recorded calories burned and track the progress. This will help the user track their workout progress and track the intensity of their workouts.

projects.title: Cookie Stand
projects.description: Cookie Stand is a project that is used to practice implementing tables, data storage, and css properties

projects.title: Chocolate Pizza
projects.description: Chocolate Pizza is a timed exercise given four hours and a detailed wireframe. The task is to create a website in accordance with the wireframe in the alloted time
